description.english: It looks like a decent club from the outside.
description.japanese: 外から見るとかなり良さそうなクラブ。
description.koreana: 겉으로 보기에는 꽤 괜찮은 클럽 같아 보인다.
description.schinese: 从外面看起来还是家不错的会所呢
description.tchinese: 從外面看起來還是家不錯的會所呢

description.english: Achieve the perfect ending for Ye Qingyu's story.
description.japanese: 葉軽語の完璧なエンディングを達成。
description.schinese: 达成叶轻语线完美结局
description.tchinese: 達成葉輕語線完美結局

description.english: Achieve the perfect ending for Nicole's story.
description.japanese: ニコルの完璧なエンディングを達成。
description.schinese: 达成妮可线完美结局
description.tchinese: 達成妮可線完美結局

description.english: Achieve the perfect ending for Lin Xi's story.
description.japanese: 林汐の完璧なエンディングを達成。
description.schinese: 达成林汐线完美结局
description.tchinese: 達成林汐線完美結局

description.english: Achieve the perfect ending for Gu Meng's story.
description.japanese: 顧夢の完璧なエンディングを達成。
description.schinese: 达成顾梦线完美结局
description.tchinese: 達成顧夢線完美結局

description.english: Achieve the Lone Wolf ending.
description.japanese: 孤独エンディングを達成。
description.schinese: 达成孤狼结局
description.tchinese: 達成孤狼結局

description.english: Reach an ending where you enter the pre-marital stage with any female protagonist, without obtaining a marriage certificate.
description.japanese: どのメインヒロインとも結婚前の段階を達成し、結婚許可証を受け取らない状態でエンディングを入る
description.koreana: 여성 주인공과 결혼 전 단계에 들어갔지만 결혼 허가증을 받지 못하는 엔딩에 도달합니다.
description.schinese: 达成与任意女主进入婚前阶段但未领取结婚证的结局
description.tchinese: 達成與任意女主進入婚前階段，但未領取結婚證的結局。

description.english: The wedding with any heroine did not take place as scheduled
description.japanese: 任意のヒロインとの結婚式が予定通り行われませんでした
description.koreana: 어느 여주인공과의 결혼식도 예정대로 진행되지 않았습니다
description.schinese: 与任意女主的婚礼没能如期举行
description.tchinese: 與任意女主的婚禮沒能如期舉行

description.english: Decorate with a water dispenser.
description.japanese: ウォーターサーバーの家具を設置。
description.schinese: 装扮饮水机家具
description.tchinese: 裝扮飲水機家具

description.english: Pay off your mom's surgery expenses.
description.japanese: 母親の手術費を全額支払い。
description.schinese: 付清妈妈的手术费
description.tchinese: 付清媽媽的手術費

description.english: Reach a romantic relationship with any heroine.
description.japanese: 任意のヒロインと恋愛関係になる。
description.schinese: 和任意女主达到热恋阶段
description.tchinese: 和任意女主達到熱戀階段

description.english: Reach the engagement stage with any heroine.
description.japanese: 任意のヒロインと婚約状態になる。
description.schinese: 和任意女主达到婚前阶段
description.tchinese: 和任意女主達到婚前階段

description.english: Get married to any heroine.
description.japanese: 任意のヒロインと結婚する。
description.schinese: 和任意女主领证
description.tchinese: 和任意女主領證

description.english: Successfully invite 50 members.
description.japanese: 50人の会員を成功裏に招待。
description.schinese: 成功邀请50名会员
description.tchinese: 成功邀請50名會員

description.english: Successfully invite 100 members.
description.japanese: 100人の会員を成功裏に招待。
description.schinese: 成功邀请100名会员
description.tchinese: 成功邀請100名會員

description.english: Successfully invite 200 members.
description.japanese: 200人の会員を成功裏に招待。
description.schinese: 成功邀请200名会员
description.tchinese: 成功邀請200名會員

description.english: Recruit a member of level 8 or higher.
description.japanese: レベル8以上の会員を1人募集。
description.schinese: 成功招募一个8级及以上的会员
description.tchinese: 成功招募一個8級及以上的會員

description.english: Match 30 members successfully.
description.japanese: 会員を30回成功裏にマッチング。
description.schinese: 成功匹配会员30次
description.tchinese: 成功匹配會員30次

description.english: Match 60 members successfully.
description.japanese: 会員を60回成功裏にマッチング。
description.schinese: 成功匹配会员60次
description.tchinese: 成功匹配會員60次

description.english: Match 100 members successfully.
description.japanese: ング 会員を100回成功裏にマッチング。
description.schinese: 成功匹配会员100次
description.tchinese: 成功匹配會員100次

description.english: Unlock all skills for Luo Tiancheng.
description.japanese: 羅天成の全スキルを解放。
description.schinese: 解锁罗天成的全部技能
description.tchinese: 解鎖羅天成的全部技能

description.english: Unlock all skills for Li Qianyu.
description.japanese: 李芊羽の全スキルを解放。
description.schinese: 解锁李芊羽的全部技能
description.tchinese: 解鎖李芊羽的全部技能

description.english: Unlock all skills for Chef Tang.
description.japanese: 湯シェフの全スキルを解放。
description.schinese: 解锁汤师傅的全部技能
description.tchinese: 解鎖湯師傅的全部技能

displayName.japanese: エネルギーに満ち溢れた

description.english: Action limit increased to 180
description.japanese: アクション制限が180に増加
description.schinese: 行动力上限提高到180
description.tchinese: 行動力上限提高到180

description.english: Unlock at least 24 pieces of equipment (in the same round)
description.japanese: 少なくとも 24 個の装備をアンロックする (同じプレイスルーで)
description.schinese: 解锁至少24件装备（在同一周目中）
description.tchinese: 解鎖至少24件裝備（在同一周目中）

description.english: Possess at least 60 cards (in the same round)
description.japanese: 合計で少なくとも60枚のカードを持っている（同じラウンドで）
description.koreana: 같은 라운드에서 총 60장 이상의 카드를 가지고 있어야 합니다.
description.schinese: 累计拥有至少60张卡牌（在同一周目中）
description.tchinese: 累計擁有至少60張卡牌（在同一周目中）

description.english: Earn 1,000 fees in a single persuasion.
description.japanese: 説得1回で会費1,000を獲得。
description.schinese: 在1次说服中获得了1000会费
description.tchinese: 在1次說服中獲得了1000會費

description.english: Earn 2,500 fees in a single persuasion.
description.japanese: 説得1回で会費2,500を獲得。
description.schinese: 在1次说服中获得了2500会费
description.tchinese: 在1次說服中獲得了2500會費

description.english: Earn 4,000 fees in a single persuasion.
description.japanese: 説得1回で会費4,000を獲得。
description.schinese: 在1次说服中获得了4000会费
description.tchinese: 在1次說服中獲得了4000會費

description.english: Club atmosphere reaches 500 points.
description.japanese: クラブの雰囲気値が500に達成。
description.schinese: 会所氛围值达到500
description.tchinese: 會所氛圍值達到500

description.english: Win first place in a store competition.
description.japanese: 店舗コンペで1位を獲得。
description.schinese: 在店面评比中获得第一
description.tchinese: 在店面評比中獲得第一

description.english: Catch a Hongxi Queenfish while fishing.
description.japanese: 釣りで「紅禧皇后魚」を釣り上げる。
description.schinese: 钓鱼钓到鸿禧皇后鱼
description.tchinese: 釣魚釣到鴻禧皇后魚

description.english: Unlock
description.japanese: 「志雄雑貨店」を解放。
description.schinese: 解锁“志雄杂货店”
description.tchinese: 解鎖「志雄雜貨店」

description.english: Feel sick after eating
description.japanese: 「臭豆腐かき氷」を食べて気持ち悪くなる。
description.schinese: 食用“臭豆腐刨冰”到反胃
description.tchinese: 食用「臭豆腐刨冰」到反胃

description.english: Have 10 pufferfish in your aquarium.
description.japanese: 水槽にフグを10匹保持。
description.schinese: 鱼缸同时拥有10条河豚
description.tchinese: 魚缸同時擁有10條河豚

description.english: Club reputation reaches level 10.
description.japanese: クラブの名声レベルが10に達成。
description.schinese: 会所声望等级达到10级
description.tchinese: 會所聲望等級達到10級

description.english: Own your own car.
description.japanese: 自分の車を所有。
description.schinese: 拥有一辆自己的汽车
description.tchinese: 擁有一輛自己的汽車

description.english: Own your own house.
description.japanese: 自分の家を所有。
description.schinese: 拥有一个自己的住处
description.tchinese: 擁有一個自己的住處

description.english: Complete Uncle Dong's questline.
description.japanese: トンおじさんのクエストを完了。
description.schinese: 完成董叔的系列任务
description.tchinese: 完成董叔的系列任務

description.english: Complete the Fisherman's questline.
description.japanese: 釣り人のクエストを完了。
description.schinese: 完成垂钓者的系列任务
description.tchinese: 完成垂釣者的系列任務

description.english: Protagonist’s stamina reaches 100.
description.japanese: 主人公の体力が100に達成。
description.schinese: 主角体能达到100
description.tchinese: 主角體能達到100

description.english: Protagonist’s courage reaches 100.
description.japanese: 主人公の勇気が100に達成。
description.schinese: 主角勇气达到100
description.tchinese: 主角勇氣達到100

description.english: Protagonist’s intelligence reaches 100.
description.japanese: 主人公の知性が100に達成。
description.schinese: 主角智慧达到100
description.tchinese: 主角智慧達到100

description.english: Protagonist’s charisma reaches 100.
description.japanese: 主人公の魅力が100に達成。
description.schinese: 主角魅力达到100
description.tchinese: 主角魅力達到100

description.english: Draw the rarest gacha item.
description.japanese: レアガチャアイテムを引き当てる。
description.schinese: 抽到隐藏款扭蛋
description.tchinese: 抽到隱藏款扭蛋

description.english: Win the top prize in the wish pool.
description.japanese: 願いのプールで大当たり。
description.schinese: 抽到许愿池的大奖
description.tchinese: 抽到許願池的大奖

description.english: Achieved the "Overdue Bill Unpaid" ending
description.japanese: ｢請求書未払い｣のエンディングを達成しました
description.schinese: 达成“账单逾期未还”的结局
description.tchinese: 達成「賬單逾期未還」的結局

description.english: Achieve the
description.japanese: 「クラブ売却」エンディングを達成。
description.schinese: 达成“卖掉会所”的结局
description.tchinese: 達成「賣掉會所」的結局

description.english: Get caught sneaking into a cinema with a heroine.
description.japanese: ヒロインと映画館に不正入場し見つかる。
description.schinese: 与女主电影院约会逃票被抓
description.tchinese: 與女主電影院約會逃票被抓

description.english: Reach a romantic relationship with five heroines.
description.japanese: 5人のヒロインと恋愛関係になる。
description.schinese: 同时和五个女主达到热恋阶段
description.tchinese: 同時和五個女主達到熱戀階段

description.english: Recruit a member without using a Wish Card. (Cannot be obtained in story mode)
description.japanese: 希望カードを使わず会員を招待成功。(ストーリーモードでは取得できません)
description.koreana: 희망 카드 없이 회원 초대 성공.(스토리 모드에서는 얻을 수 없습니다)
description.schinese: 不使用意愿卡成功邀请一名会员(无法在剧情模式下获得)
description.tchinese: 不使用意願卡成功邀請一名會員(無法在劇情模式下獲得)

description.english: Recruit a member but earn 0 fees. (Cannot be obtained in story mode)
description.japanese: 会員を招待成功したが会費0を獲得。(ストーリーモードでは取得できません)
description.koreana: 회원 초대 성공했으나 회비 0 획득.(스토리 모드에서는 얻을 수 없습니다)
description.schinese: 成功邀请到一名会员获得0会费(无法在剧情模式下获得)
description.tchinese: 成功邀請到一名會員獲得0會費(無法在劇情模式下獲得)

description.english: Successfully land in Ye Qingyu's story. (Cannot be obtained in story mode)
description.japanese: 葉軽語ストーリーで成功裏に着地。(ストーリーモードでは取得できません)
description.koreana: 예칭위 스토리에서 성공적으로 착지.(스토리 모드에서는 얻을 수 없습니다)
description.schinese: 叶轻语剧情中成功落地(无法在剧情模式下获得)
description.tchinese: 葉輕語劇情中成功落地(無法在劇情模式下獲得)

description.english: Convince Jokker in Nicole's story. (Cannot be obtained in story mode)
description.japanese: ニコルストーリーでジョッカーを説得成功。(ストーリーモードでは取得できません)
description.koreana: 니콜 스토리에서 Jokker 설득 성공.(스토리 모드에서는 얻을 수 없습니다)
description.schinese: 妮可剧情中成功说服jokker(无法在剧情模式下获得)
description.tchinese: 妮可劇情中成功說服jokker(無法在劇情模式下獲得)

description.english: Get caught with a fracture in Lin Xi's story. (Cannot be obtained in story mode)
description.japanese: 林汐ストーリーで骨折が見つかる。(ストーリーモードでは取得できません)
description.koreana: 린시 스토리에서 골절로 발각.(스토리 모드에서는 얻을 수 없습니다)
description.schinese: 林汐剧情中检查身体被发现骨折(无法在剧情模式下获得)
description.tchinese: 林汐劇情中檢查身體被發現骨折(無法在劇情模式下獲得)

description.english: Convince Lei Xiaojun without exposing flaws. (Cannot be obtained in story mode)
description.japanese: レイ・シャオジュンの欠点を暴かずに説得。(ストーリーモードでは取得できません)
description.koreana: 결점을 드러내지 않고 레이샤오준 설득.(스토리 모드에서는 얻을 수 없습니다)
description.schinese: 顾梦剧情中在不揭露雷小君破绽的情况下说服他(无法在剧情模式下获得)
description.tchinese: 顧夢劇情中在不揭露雷小君破綻的情況下說服他(無法在劇情模式下獲得)

description.english: Rest on a bench for over 8 hours.
description.japanese: ベンチで8時間以上休憩。
description.schinese: 在长椅上休息超过8小时
description.tchinese: 在長椅上休息超過8小時

description.english: Receive a reward from a purchased house.
description.japanese: 購入した家から1つの報酬を獲得。
description.schinese: 从购买的房子里获得1个奖励
description.tchinese: 從購買的房子裡獲得1個獎勵

description.english: Have Full, Nauseated, and Drunk states at once.
description.japanese: 化不良 満腹、吐き気、酔っぱらい状態を同時に経験。
description.koreana: 배부름, 메스꺼움, 취함 상태를 동시에 경험.
description.schinese: 同时拥有饱腹、反胃和醉酒状态
description.tchinese: 同時擁有飽腹、反胃和醉酒狀態

description.english: Get hit by a car once.
description.japanese: 車に1回ぶつかる。
description.schinese: 被车撞1次
description.tchinese: 被車撞1次

description.english: Unlock all of Aunt Wang's skills.
description.japanese: ワンおばさんのスキルをすべてアンロックする
description.koreana: 왕 이모의 모든 스킬을 잠금 해제하세요.
description.schinese: 解锁王姨的全部技能
description.tchinese: 解鎖王姨的全部技能

description.english: Achieve Sophia’s Perfect Ending
description.japanese: ソフィアルート完璧エンド達成
description.schinese: 达成索菲亚线完美结局
description.tchinese: 達成索菲亞線完美結局

description.english: Persuade Zhuo Meifeng in Sophia's story without using [Refute] (Not achievable in story mode)
description.japanese: ソフィアのストーリーで【反論】を使わず卓美鳳を説得（ストーリーモードでは不可）
description.koreana: 소피아 스토리에서 [반박] 없이 주오 메이펑 설득 성공 (스토리 모드에서는 불가)
description.schinese: 索菲亚剧情中不使用【驳斥】成功说服卓美凤（在剧情模式下无法完成）
description.tchinese: 索菲亞劇情中不使用【駁斥】成功說服卓美鳳（劇情模式下無法完成）

description.english: Unlock all skills for Lin Songzi.
description.japanese: 林松子の全スキルを解放。
description.schinese: 解锁林松子的全部技能
description.tchinese: 解鎖林松子的全部技能

description.english: Unlock all skills for Chen Suxi.
description.japanese: チェン・スーシーの全スキルを解放。
description.schinese: 解锁陈素熙的全部技能
description.tchinese: 解鎖陳素熙的全部技能

description.english: Unlock all helpers and receive encouragement for Bai Xiangqin.
description.japanese: すべてのヘルパーをロック解除し、白相親の励みになる
description.koreana: 모든 도우미 잠금 해제, 그리고 백상친 격려
description.schinese: 解锁全部帮手，并且得到白相亲的鼓励
description.tchinese: 解鎖全部幫手，並且得到白相親的鼓勵
